title: Top hashtags used by U.S. Congress Democrats in 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total number of mentions for 10 number of Hashtags.
Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions and #hr1 has the lowest Total number of mentions.
The highest Hashtag #forthepeople has 5278.0 more Total number of mentions than the lowest Hashtag #hr1.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hashtag in the x axis and Total number of mentions in the y axis.
The Total number of mentions is highest at Hashtag #forthepeople and lowest at Hashtag #hr1.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Total number of mentions for 10 number of Hashtags.
Hashtag #forthepeople has the highest Total number of mentions and #hr1 has the lowest Total number of mentions.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Hashtag in the x axis and Total number of mentions in the y axis.
The Total number of mentions is highest at Hashtag #forthepeople and lowest at Hashtag #hr1.
The second highest Total number of mentions is appeared to be the Hashtag #trumpshutdown.
The highest Hashtag #forthepeople has 5278.0 more Total number of mentions than the lowest Hashtag #hr1.
Hashtag #forthepeople is higher than any other Hashtags with value 6961.0, followed by #trumpshutdown, and #protectourcare. Down to Hashtag #hr1 with the lowest value 1683.0.
Hashtag #hr8, and #actonclimate have a similar Total number of mentions that is 2206.0.
The Hashtag #forthepeople has 2.54 times more Total number of mentions than average.
The Total number of mentions is 27456.0 if we add up values of all Hashtags.
